info.title: BeezUP gateway-feeds API
info.description:
# The REST API of BeezUP system - Adapter for Feed Management
## Overview
The REST APIs provide programmatic access to read and write BeezUP data. 

This API have to be implemented by the marketplaces to be able to receive/send data from BeezUP.


The main features are:
- Receive merchant feeds (products and offers)
- ...


## Things to keep in mind
### Media type
The default media type for requests and responses is application/json. Where noted, some operations support other content types. If no additional content type is mentioned for a specific operation, then the media type is application/json.

### Required content type
The required and default encoding for the request and responses is UTF8.

### Required date time format
All our date time are formatted in ISO 8601 format: 2014-06-24T16:25:00Z.

### Base URL
All URLs returned by the BeezUP API are relative to this base URL, and all requests to the REST API must use this base URL template.

You can test our API on https://beezup.github.io/mkp-adpt-api-docs/swagger-ui\\
You can contact us on [gitter, #BeezUP/API](https://gitter.im/BeezUP/API)

404_Publication_NotFound.description: The combination of MarketplaceBusinessCode, AccountId and publication id is not found

400_MBC_Invalid.description: The marketplace business code is invalid is invalid

409_Publication_Already_Completed.description: The publication id is already completed

304_NotModified.description: The ETag sent in the http header If-None-Match did not change. So you are up to date !

Last-Modified.description:
Last modification UTC date of the resource\
For more details go to this link: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.2

ETag.description:
ETag value to identify the current version of the resource\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

200_HealthCheck.description: The health check of the API

503_Marketplace_Down.description: The marketplace has an invalid response

400_MBC_Or_Request_Invalid.description: The marketplace business code is invalid or the request is invalid

404_BeezUP_TraceId_NotFound.description: BeezUP Trace Id is not found

412_PreConditionFailed.description: The ETag sent in the http header If-Match did not match with the current version. Please refresh the information related to this resource.

ETag.description:
The ETag value to identify the resource.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

merchantNotFound.description: The merchant code is not found.

marketplaceNotFound.description: The marketplace code is not found.

merchantOrMarketplaceNotFound.description: The merchant code or marketplace code is not found.

merchantCodeAlreadyUsed.description: The merchant code is not available

invalidMerchantCode.description: The merchant code is different from the state

notOfferSourceMarketplace.description: The marketplace is not the offer source

subscriptionNotAccepted.description: The subscription is not accepted by the marketplace

credentialNotConfigured.description: The credential is not configured for the marketplace

beezUPRequestIdHeaderParameter.name: x-BeezUP-RequestId
beezUPRequestIdHeaderParameter.description: Indicates to the server the BeezUP request id related to this call. All traces must use this id to be able to follow it.

beezUPCorrelationIdHeaderParameter.name: x-BeezUP-CorrelationId
beezUPCorrelationIdHeaderParameter.description: Indicates to the server the BeezUP correlation id related to this call. All traces must use this id to be able to follow it.

credentialParameter.name: x-BeezUP-Credential
credentialParameter.description: It's the merchant configuration related to the marketplace, serialiazed in json in base64.

pageNumberQueryStringParameter.name: pageNumber
pageNumberQueryStringParameter.description: The page number you want to get

pageSizeQueryStringParameter.name: pageSize
pageSizeQueryStringParameter.description: The entry count you want to get

acceptEncodingRequiredParameter.name: Accept-Encoding
acceptEncodingRequiredParameter.description: Allows the client to indicate wether it accepts a compressed encoding to reduce traffic size.

ifNoneMatchRequiredParameter.name: If-None-Match
ifNoneMatchRequiredParameter.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To avoid useless exchange, we recommend you to indicate the ETag you previously got from this operation.\
If the ETag value does not match the response will be 200 to give you a new content, otherwise the response will be: 304 Not Modified, without any content.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

contentEncodingRequiredParameter.name: Content-Encoding
contentEncodingRequiredParameter.description: The content of the body is compressed to reduce traffic size.

correlationIdParameter.name: correlationId
correlationIdParameter.description: It's the guid corresponding to the operation.

beezUPTraceIdHeaderParameter.name: x-BeezUP-TraceId
beezUPTraceIdHeaderParameter.description: Indicates to the server the BeezUP trace id related to this call. All traces must use this id to be able to follow it.

ifNoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
ifNoneMatchParameter.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To avoid useless exchange, we recommend you to indicate the ETag you previously got from this operation.\
If the ETag value does not match the response will be 200 to give you a new content, otherwise the response will be: 304 Not Modified, without any content.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

ifMatchParameter.name: If-Match
ifMatchParameter.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To ensure that you are making a change on the lastest version of the resource.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

acceptLanguageParameter.name: Accept-Language
acceptLanguageParameter.description: Indicates that the client accepts the following languages.

acceptEncodingOptionalParameter.name: Accept-Encoding
acceptEncodingOptionalParameter.description: Allows the client to indicate wether it accepts a compressed encoding to reduce traffic size.

pageNumberQueryStrngParameter.name: pageNumber
pageNumberQueryStrngParameter.description: The page number you want to get

pageSizeQueryStrngParameter.name: pageSize
pageSizeQueryStrngParameter.description: The entry count you want to get

post.summary: Get the Health check of your feed system

204.description: The feed publication has been started!

post.summary: Push a batch of feed messages

202.description: The feed messages have been registered!

204.description: The feed comands has been completed!

Content-Encoding.description: The response is compressed to reduce traffic.

get.summary: Get the publication exchanged messages with the marketplace

metadata.description: where key is the marketplace column name

docUrl.description: The documentation related to this operation.

code.description: the error code. The error code can be a pattern containing the argument's name

message.example: There is already an importation in progress: b24d0dd8-a561-478a-9b26-34f573f03527

cultureName.description: If the error is translated, the culture name will be indicated

value.description: The value of the parameter. Depending to the type.

message.description: Gets the status message of the check.

healthCheckStatus.description:
Possible status values of a health check result.
* degraded:  The check is degraded, failing but not critical
* healthy: The check is healthy
* ignored: The check was ignored
* unhealthy:  The check is unhealthy

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers. http://schema.org/sku

correlationId.description: The correlation identifier. It's a guid.

requestId.description: The request identifier. It's a guid.

deliveryMethod.description: A delivery method is a standardized procedure for transferring the product or service to the destination of fulfillment chosen by the customer. Delivery methods are characterized by the means of transportation used, and by the organization or group that is the contracting party for the sending organization or person.

ecommerceSoftwareName.description: The e-commerce software name of the merchant

firstName.description: The first name of a person

lastName.description: The last name of a person

messageId.description: The message identifier. It's a guid.

causeId.description: The cause identifier. It's a guid.

merchantCode.description: The merchant code identifier in IMN

marketplaceCode.description:
The marketplace code identifier in IMN.
For now we have:
- C1 for Cdiscount
- E1 for ePrice
- R1 for Real.DE
- B1 for BOL
- E2 for eMAG

marketplaceMerchantCode.description: The merchant code for a marketplace

pageSize.description: Indicate the item count per page

productFilterOperatorName.description: Indicate the operator you want to make on the columnId

gtin.description:
Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of the item.
Supported values:

- UPC (in North America / GTIN-12)
12-digit number like 323456789012
8-digit UPC-E codes should be converted to 12-digit codes
- EAN (in Europe / GTIN-13)
13-digit number like 3001234567892
- JAN (in Japan / GTIN-13)
8 or 13-digit number like 49123456 or 4901234567894
- ISBN (for books)
10 or 13-digit number like 1455582344 or 978-1455582341. If you have both, only include the 13-digit number. ISBN-10 are deprecated and should be converted to ISBN-13
- ITF-14 (for multipacks / GTIN-14)
14-digit number like 10856435001702

Schema.org property:
- [Offer.gtin8](http://schema.org/gtin8)
- [Offer.gtin12](http://schema.org/gtin12)
- [Offer.gtin13](http://schema.org/gtin13)
- [Offer.gtin14](http://schema.org/gtin14)
- [Offer.isbn](http://schema.org/isbn)

parameterIn.description:
* path: if the parameter must be pass in the path uri
* header: if the parameter must be passed in http header
* query: if the parameter must be passed in querystring
* body: if the parameter must be passed in the body
* file: if the parameter must be passed in a multipart/form-data (https://swagger.io/docs/specification/2-0/file-upload/)

operationSourceType.description:
Indicates the origin of the operation:
* api: the operation has been done using our api directly.
* ui: the operation has been done using our user interface.

processingStatus.description: The processing status of an operation

BeezUP.Common.PageSize.description: Indicate the item count per page

categoryPath.description: Indicates on which catalog category path you want to make the filter
Indicates on which channel category path you want to make the filter

values.description:
Must be null if the operator is "IsNull" or "IsNotNull".
Can contains multiple value in case of "InList" operator. Otherwise a single value is expected.

BeezUP.Common.AdditionalProductFilters.description:
Describe a filter on a product's column.
The key is the column identifier of your catalog or a custom column.

BeezUP.Common.MarketplaceBusinessCode.description: In an marketplace technical code like CDiscount you can have several marketplaces like GO SPORT, etc. We identify them by a business code.
